usersList.title: Users list
usersList.description: Manage your organization's users and their access.

empty.title: No users found
empty.description: Check your logs or invite new users if the list is empty.

invite.title: Invite a new user
invite.description: Enter the user's information and select their role in the organization.

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: Define system roles and their permissions
roles.newRoleDescription: Define a code and a name. The code must be unique in your organization.
roles.name: Name
roles.selectRoleDescription: Click on a role to view and edit its permissions
roles.adminAllPermissions: Administrators have all permissions by default.
roles.selectRoleMessage: Please select a role to view its details and permissions

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm deletion
deleteConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete the role "{name}"? This action is irreversible and will also delete all associated permissions.

messages.checkConsole: Check the console for technical details.
messages.unknownError: An unknown error occurred while retrieving users.
messages.noOrganization: No organization selected or found to display users.
messages.supabaseNotInitialized: Supabase client not initialized or user not logged in.
messages.emailRoleRequired: Email and role are required to invite a user.
messages.roleNotExists: The selected role does not exist.
messages.roleUpdatedSuccess: The role "{name}" has been updated successfully.
messages.roleDuplicatedSuccess: The role "{original}" has been duplicated as "{new}".
messages.roleDeletedSuccess: The role has been deleted successfully.

institute.title: Institute profile
institute.description: Manage your training institution's information that will appear on the platform

logo.title: Logo and visual information
logo.formats: Accepted formats: PNG, JPG, SVG. Max size: 2MB
logo.invalidTypeDescription: Please select a PNG, JPG, or SVG file.
logo.publicUrlError: Unable to get public URL of uploaded logo.

publicProfile.title: Public profile
publicProfile.enabledDescription: Your institute is now publicly visible
publicProfile.disabledDescription: Your institute is no longer publicly visible

info.title: Institute information
info.description: This information will be displayed publicly on your training platform
info.name: Institute name

errors.notFoundDescription: Please check your configuration or contact support.

success.updatedDescription: Institute information has been saved successfully.

validation.nameMin: Name must contain at least 2 characters
validation.legalNameMin: Legal name must contain at least 2 characters
validation.descriptionMin: Description must contain at least 10 characters
validation.addressMin: Address must contain at least 5 characters
validation.cityMin: City must contain at least 2 characters
validation.websiteInvalid: Website URL must start with http://, https:// or www.

branding.title: Branding & Public Site
branding.description: Control center for your visual identity and public site

errors.tableNotFound: Error: Branding settings table does not exist.
errors.tableNotFoundDescription: Please contact the administrator to resolve this issue.
errors.noPermission: Error: You do not have the necessary permissions.
errors.noPermissionDescription: Please contact the administrator to obtain the necessary permissions.
errors.saveErrorDescription: Unable to save settings. Please try again.
errors.organizationNotReady: Organization or user not identified, or Supabase client not ready.

success.colorsResetDescription: All colors have been reset to default values.

colors.title: Main colors
colors.description: Define the main colors that will be used throughout the interface
colors.headerFooterDescription: Customize the appearance of the header and footer

typography.title: Typography
typography.description: Configure fonts and text sizes for your site

logo.title: Organization logo
logo.description: Upload your organization's logo. Recommended format: PNG or SVG, minimum size 200x200px
logo.formats: Accepted formats: PNG, SVG. Maximum size: 2MB

favicon.title: Favicon
favicon.description: Upload your site's favicon. Recommended format: ICO or PNG, size 32x32px
favicon.formats: Accepted formats: ICO, PNG. Maximum size: 1MB

analytics.title: Public Site Analytics
analytics.description: Track your public site performance (coming soon)
analytics.comingSoonDescription: Your public site statistics will be available here once activated

preview.title: Preview
preview.descriptionText: This preview shows how your changes will be applied to the platform.
preview.tip1: Use colors that match your logo and visual identity
preview.tip2: Ensure sufficient contrast between text and background
preview.tip3: Limit yourself to 2-3 main colors for a clean interface
preview.tip4: Test on different devices to ensure readability
preview.tip5: Don't forget to save your changes
preview.note: Changes made will affect the appearance of both the admin interface and the learner interface.
preview.interfaceDescription: Preview of the admin interface with your colors

previewElements.cardContent: This is what your card content will look like.

notifications.title: Emails and notifications
notifications.description: Configure messages sent to your platform users

emailTemplates.title: Email templates
emailTemplates.description: Manage email templates sent to users
emailTemplates.selectTemplateDescription: Click on a template to view and edit its content
emailTemplates.subject: Subject

tips.title: Tips for sending emails in Senegal
tips.tip1: Make sure all emails contain company contact information
tips.tip2: The main language is French, but consider Wolof options if possible
tips.tip3: Respect local time zones for sending emails (UTC+0)
tips.tip4: Take into account possible mobile connection issues

emailTemplates.empty: Please select an email template to edit

notificationSettings.title: Notification settings
notificationSettings.description: Configure when and how notifications are sent to users

sms.title: SMS settings
sms.description: Configure SMS sending for critical notifications (Adapted for Senegal)
sms.senderIdDescription: Limited to 11 characters, no spaces or special characters.
sms.monthlyLimitDescription: Maximum SMS you can send per month.

specifics.title: SMS specifics in Senegal
specifics.tip1: Number format: International format +221 XX XXX XX XX
specifics.tip2: Character limit: 160 for a standard SMS (70 in Unicode)
specifics.tip3: Optimize for local mobile network which can sometimes be unstable
specifics.tip4: Preferably send in French to ensure understanding

systemMessages.title: System messages
systemMessages.description: Configure messages displayed in the user interface
systemMessages.intro: This section allows you to customize messages displayed to users in the interface.
systemMessages.comingSoonDescription: This feature will be available soon. You will be able to customize all system messages on the platform.
